prompt_base: agile rabbit-like warrior, lean muscular physique, pale lavender skin, long pointed rabbit ears, determined confident stare, black and red uniform, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: alien skin texture, subtle fur sheen, individual hair strands, athletic body, realistic fabric weave on uniform, sharp focus
